goals__remit:
The Pharmaceutical Group of the European Union (PGEU) is the European association representing community pharmacists. 
 
 
PGEU’s members are the national associations and professional bodies of community pharmacists in 32 European countries including EU Member States, EU candidate countries and EFTA members.
